mapper.insert: insert into t_work (work_id, driver_id, machine_id, site, employer, Constructors, actual_hours, invoice_hours, diesel_cost, work_date, cash, scooter_order_id, hourly_wage, receive_cash) values (#{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{constructors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invoiceHours,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dieselCost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cash,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scooterOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hourlyWage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiveCash,jdbcType=INTEGER})
